name: Rainbow Run (itch)
description:
Rainbow Run is an infinity-running game produced by the Dat Op Games team. Featuring graphics full of colorful animations, fun soundtracks and lots of power-ups, coins and Rainbows to collect! Available for Windows and MAC OS platforms. Come and have fun with the Rainbows!

CONTROLS:

ANY BUTTOM to jump. (double jump enabled)

ENTER to play.

use the MOUSE to choose your RAINBOW.


by Dat Op Games team.
